subtitle: .@MOFAMyanmar's pathetically weak attempt at blame shifting for failure of latest #Rohingya repatriation fools no one. title: Sara Lueken #clearthelists

title: Michael Bociurkiw
subtitle: .@Refugees estimates that someone is forcibly displaced every 2-seconds, with 70.8 million people forced from their homes. Among them are 25.9 million refugees, over half of whom are under 18. Main source countries for refugees: Syria, Afghanistan, S. Sudan #G7 #Refugees pic.twitter.com/cA8C0o8HRE

title: Australia for UNHCR
subtitle:
Two years on. 
​
​Two years ago over 742,000 Rohingya were forced to flee Myanmar. 
 ​Today, UNHCR continues to provide life-saving assistance and empower refugees to build a better future for themselves and their families.
